type2_incorrect.reasoning: Password hashing uses SHA256 instead of bcryptjs as specified
Session cookie maxAge set to 1 day (86400 seconds) instead of 7 days
Login endpoint returns status 200 for errors instead of proper error status codes (400/401)
Tasks GET endpoint returns status 200 for UNAUTHORIZED error instead of 401
Tasks POST endpoint returns status 200 for all errors instead of proper status codes (400/401)
Error response format is flat object {error: string} instead of nested {error: {code: string, message: string}}
PUT /api/tasks/[id] creates new task instead of updating existing task
Task toggle functionality toggles ALL tasks instead of single clicked task
